Cryptocurrency is an ideal currency of the test, now no one can predict the future of cryptocurrency, it may succeed, it may also fail, of course, the ideal currency in each mind is not the same, but the existing monetary system is indeed very disappointing, technology is progressing, advanced technology if used for the common human welfare is a fortunate thing, and advanced technology if used to meet personal desires, then it is a great misfortune, but advanced technology is still promoting the improvement of productivity, It is a privilege to experience this change, let us witness the changes brought by the change of technology to human society! Respects pioneers! Respect for people full of ideals!
